ban.title: User was banned
ban.description: User was banned on this server

unban.title: User has been unbanned
unban.description: You have unbanned a user on this server

mute.title: User was muted
mute.description: User was muted on this server

unmute.title: User was unmuted
unmute.description: User was unmuted on this server

kick.title: User was kicked
kick.description: User was kicked from the server

clear.title: Messages have been deleted
clear.description: You have deleted messages in the channel

server_warns.title: All warns on the server
server_warns.description:
To remove a warn, use the command:
`/moderation unwarn <case-number>`.
You can find the case number when viewing user alerts or server warnings (if you are viewing the second option, the case number is the number by account in embed)

user_warns.title: All member's warns
user_warns.description:
To remove a warn, use the command:
`/moderation unwarn <case-number>`.
You can find the case number when viewing user alerts or server warnings (if you are viewing the second option, the case number is the number by account in embed)
